Room.Name: Marlea's Silver Apple Tree
Room.ShortDescription: Marlea's beautiful silver apple tree is overhead, and her hut is close by.
Room.LongDescription: Marlea is the wild one, and Mehetable has to watch her closely as she often allows young men to enter her hut late at night. Mehetable has been known to paralyze with fear those who visit, and feed them to the neighboring trolls.
